greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows. T(n,k) is the number of flags in an n dimensional vector space over GF(2) that have length exactly k, n >= 0, 0 <= k <= n.
link: Kent E. Morrison, Integer Sequences and Matrices Over Finite Fields, Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 9 (2006), Article 06.2.1.
formula: T(n,k)/A005329(n) is the coefficient of y^k*x^n in 1/(1 - y (eq(x) - 1)) where eq(x) is the q-exponential function.
mathematica: nn = 8; eq[z_] := Sum[z^n/FunctionExpand[QFactorial[n, q]], {n, 0, nn}];Table[Take[(Table[ FunctionExpand[QFactorial[n, q]] /. q -> 2, {n, 0,  nn}] CoefficientList[Series[ 1/(1 - u (eq[z] - 1)) /. q -> 2, {z, 0, nn}], {z, u}])[[i]], i], {i, 1, nn + 1}] // Grid
results.author: _Geoffrey Critzer_, Jul 28 2017
